alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Pennington; Red Lake; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Red Lake, south central Polk and southwestern Pennington Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Gentilly and Red Lake Falls, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Red Lake Falls, Plummer, St. Hilaire, Mentor, Brooks, Maple Bay and Gentilly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Pennington; Red Lake; West Polk
